Dear John Doe,

A collaborator of your application "foo-app" on The Things Network has been added or updated.

Collaborator: user "foo-usr"

Rights:

- RIGHT_APPLICATION_INFO: view application information
- RIGHT_APPLICATION_SETTINGS_BASIC: edit basic application settings
- RIGHT_APPLICATION_DEVICES_READ: view devices in application
- RIGHT_APPLICATION_TRAFFIC_READ: read application traffic (uplink and downlink)

You can go to https://console.cloud.thethings.network/applications/foo-app/collaborators/user/foo-usr to view and edit this collaborator in the Console.
